narrators.alternative_names: Mawran ibn Uthman al-Zarqi, Abu Uthman al-Madani

narrators.name: Ibn Abi Najih
narrators.full_name: Shafi ibn Mata' al-Asbahi or Ibn Abi Najih
narrators.alternative_names: Shafi ibn Mata' al-Asbahi, Shafi ibn Abdillah al-Masri

narrators.name: Mujahid
narrators.full_name: Mujahid ibn Jabr al-Makki
narrators.alternative_names: Umar ibn Rabi'ah al-Iyadī or Mujahid al-Makki

chainIssues: Multiple weak narrators in the chain (Adam, Warqa', Ibn Abi Najih)
Use of عَنْ (indirect transmission) from Ibn Abi Najih
Very weak narrator (Ibn Abi Najih) with indirect transmission term affects chain reliability significantly

potential_issues.issue: Ibn Abi Najih (Shafi ibn Mata') narrates using عَنْ (indirect transmission)
potential_issues.impact: This narrator is classified as very weak (Da'if Jiddan), and the use of indirect transmission further weakens the chain

potential_issues.issue: Multiple weak narrators in succession (Adam, Warqa', Ibn Abi Najih)
potential_issues.impact: The chain contains three consecutive weak or unknown narrators, significantly compromising authenticity
